item.description:
Join us for another fun night of great music and dancing!

Soul Kitchen is a nine-piece horn band featuring April Hall and Joe Bargar on vocals. They put their own personal touch on all of our Soul and R&B favorites with their distinctive sound. These musicians have worked with Aretha, Stevie Wonder, Otis Rush and Ray Charles, among others!

Listen to their music on the link below:

http://www.soulkitchenband.com/pages/listen.html


The show starts at 9:00pm, and there is a $12 cover charge. It gets crowded, so arrive on time. Some of us may try and have dinner before; details will follow closer to the date.

At Johnny Ds recently we had a terrific group of people who literally tore up the dance floor. Let's do it again!
item.name: Soul Kitchen at Ryles
